long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Nested is a CMS , that allow you to make a site in the easiest way , just choose what content you want to add then add it in your page ... you shouldn't worry about host and domain just sign up and make your site in few minutes then you can buy extra storage and buy your own web address (domain) for your site .
features:
Fully responsive sites power by Bootstrap
Beautiful app with Android Material design 
Easy to learn and help section
Gorgeous customizable themes, free for everyone
Unlimited pages and items in pages
Add picture , text , header , slideshow and etc (still lots in way in near future)
Add iPanel stuffs such as YouTube videos and lots more services
Upload your file and share them with your friends
Make changes offline and when you be come online again it will apply new changes
See your site statistic of your site visits 
Set how many domain you want in one site
Share links and your social accounts with your friends in menu of your site
4 different languages and more on way (English , French and Persian for now )
we are in beta testing so , be with us and help us to make it better day by day .
also we are open to corporating in this project, you can contact us :HamidQasemy@outlook.com
